description.message: Convenient resource capture tool, press the Ins key to enter the element selection mode, after the mouse is selected, press the Ins key again to cancel the mode, details please go to the Settings page to view.

el_selector.message: The title source of the resource is captured by default, which is a CSS selector, and the Ins key is recommended for element selection

option_path.message: Matches resource urls. Only regular is supported

save_all_message.message: Please do not check chrome 'settings download content and ask for the save location of each file before downloading' to avoid multiple pop-up windows!
